name: 50 Classic Games 3D
description:
It’s all right here, in 50 Classic Games for Nintendo 3DS! With new eye-popping graphics and interactive features, you’ll get lost for hours in the wildly entertaining games that range from backgammon to brainteasers! Try your hand at Texas Hold’Em, Blackjack, and Roulette. Rediscover classic board and dice games like Farkle, Chess, and Mahjongg. Go fishing, play air hockey, take out enemy battleships, and throw darts! Solve tricky brainteasers, picture puzzles, and more!

Features

• Try your hand at Texas Hold’Em and Roulette
• Play games like Farkle, Chess, and Mahjongg
• Go fishing, play air hockey, and throw darts!
• Solve tricky brainteasers, picture puzzles, and more!
